channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 我的新特斯拉在我的每月预算中烧掉了 511 美元。我是否可以通过取消我不需要的订阅来支付这笔费用？
item.description:
My new Tesla was burning a $511 hole in my monthly budget. Could I cover the cost just by getting rid of subscriptions I didn’t need? https://t.co/UDY0qNEIcc https://t.co/UDY0qNEIcc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 旧金山价值 3800 万美元的豪宅。茂宜岛南侧的一栋宽敞住宅。Nvidia 联合创始人、总裁兼首席执行官黄仁勋的房产组合。
item.description:
A $38 million San Francisco mansion. A sprawling home on the south side of Maui. Inside the property portfolio of Nvidia co-founder, president and CEO Jensen Huang. https://t.co/ry4XVA2EZ7 https://t.co/ry4XVA2EZ7

item.title: 巴塞罗那椅伊姆斯休闲椅和长椅。经典，但过于夸张，被无情地淘汰，令人疲倦。是时候考虑一下这些设计师认可的、同样别致的替代品了。
item.description:
The Barcelona Chair. The Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Classic, but overexposed, relentlessly knocked-off and just tired. It's time to consider one of these designer-approved, equally chic alternatives. https://t.co/CGwO3VLE4S https://t.co/CGwO3VLE4S

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: "最好的朋友 "是 20 世纪的说法。这里有九个新词来解释我们生活中的人对我们意味着什么。
item.description:
“Best friend” is such a 20th-century expression. Here are nine new terms to explain what the people in our lives mean to us. https://t.co/YdrYbNlHkz https://t.co/YdrYbNlHkz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 游泳池非常大。牛排馆的烤土豆要 15 美元。这个佛罗里达州的新度假村是由......一家廉价航空公司经营的？
item.description:
The pools are massive. Au gratin potatoes cost $15 at the steakhouse. This new Florida resort is run by…a budget airline? https://t.co/uQpYyk1knL pic.twitter.com/M8ZoivU7yt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 瑞克-欧文斯说："看到自己的时装设计在世界上流行起来，总是令人欣喜不已，""但当我看到山寨版时装时，几乎更令人欣喜"。
item.description:
“It’s always a delight,” Rick Owens says of seeing his fashion designs in the world, “but it’s almost more of a delight when I see knockoffs.” https://t.co/cxsIGO3kX1 https://t.co/cxsIGO3kX1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 十年前，在比佛利山以南的比佛利伍德，二三十万美元就能买到一栋房子。现在呢？"你不可能在任何一条黄金街道上以低于 300 万美元的价格买到一块地"。
item.description:
A decade ago, you could buy a house in Beverlywood, just south of Beverly Hills, for $200,000 to $300,000. Now? “You can’t buy just land on any of the prime streets for less than $3 million.” https://t.co/hY0tOQ518U https://t.co/hY0tOQ518U

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: "无知是福"。新罕布什尔州的这几位房主在着手建造一座价值 160 万美元的认证 "被动式 "住宅时，并不十分清楚自己的处境。
item.description:
"Ignorance is bliss." These New Hampshire homeowners didn't quite know what they were getting themselves into as they embarked on building a $1.6 million certified "passive" home. https://t.co/wSG6YmZaxN https://t.co/wSG6YmZaxN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 独生子女越来越普遍。当父母年老时，他们可能会面临沉重的负担。

item.title: 如果您前往世界贵宾之都，并同意尝试所有倒卖服务，会怎么样？我们的旅行记者对拉斯维加斯的每项升级都说 "好" 👇 A thread

item.title: 一位护士用一辆高尔夫球车和一辆类似于 "奥斯汀-鲍尔斯"（Austin Powers）中的卡车的零件，制造了他那辆罕见的 1969 年斯巴鲁 360 电动车。
item.description:

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：Mickey D. Levy 写道：美联储需要回避降低利率的呼声，转而更多地了解创新是如何影响实际经济表现的。
item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一名俄罗斯直升机飞行员叛逃后，乌克兰举国欢庆。没过多久，他就暴毙而亡--这也是越来越多与普京作对的人的命运。
item.description:
Ukraine celebrated when a Russian helicopter pilot defected. It didn’t take long for him to die a violent death—increasingly, the fate awaiting people who cross Putin. https://t.co/7ZCIeibZQw https://t.co/7ZCIeibZQw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 本文作者成为超级通勤者已有一年多时间。以下是在一个城市（纽约）工作，在另一个城市（俄亥俄州哥伦布市）生活所需的条件。
item.description:
This writer has been a supercommuter for more than a year. Here’s what it takes to work in one city (New York) and live in another (Columbus, Ohio). https://t.co/cSrwWACuW2 pic.twitter.com/HLIcFYsyGQ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：如何生活取决于你自己。如果你想要一个目标或使命，那就去非营利组织工作吧。但营利性公司规模更大，对社会的影响也更大，@andykessler 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: How you live your life is up to you. If you want a purpose or mission, by all means, go work for a nonprofit. But for-profit companies have scale and a much bigger impact on society, writes @andykessler. https://t.co/E44pPeF0U3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 首席执行官、亿万富翁和流行歌星蕾哈娜在信实工业公司董事长穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）小儿子的豪华婚前派对上擦肩而过
item.description:
CEOs, billionaires and pop star Rihanna rubbed shoulders at a lavish pre-wedding party for the youngest son of Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani https://t.co/Z9NGvHMv9l https://t.co/Z9NGvHMv9l

item.title: 重大新闻中国将今年的 GDP 增长目标定为 5%左右，与 2023 年持平。经济学家表示，要实现这一目标，需要更多的刺激措施。
item.description:
Breaking: China set a GDP growth target of around 5% for the year, unchanged from 2023. Economists say the goal will require more stimulus. https://t.co/lm6SkHvMB4 https://t.co/lm6SkHvMB4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 随着自动驾驶越来越接近现实，汽车设计师和科技公司正在更多地考虑人们如何使用汽车来工作
item.description:
As automated driving gets closer to reality, car designers and tech companies are giving more thought to how people may use vehicles to work https://t.co/HLZMwB67PI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 老派狩猎、钓鱼和骑马品牌的服装可以成为现代都市的华丽服饰。这里有四家体育用品店，其优雅的产品无论在城市、乡村还是其他地方，都能让人眼前一亮。

item.title: 杰夫-贝索斯再次成为世界首富，自 2021 年秋季以来首次在彭博亿万富豪指数中超越埃隆-马斯克。
item.description:
Jeff Bezos is once again the world’s richest person, eclipsing Elon Musk on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index for the first time since the fall of 2021 https://t.co/kaixH3EMlj https://t.co/kaixH3EMlj

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：Allysia Finley 写道：无论特朗普在经济上有什么过错，与司法部长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯为摧毁政治对手而亵渎法律的行为相比，它们都显得微不足道
item.description:

item.title: 即使是昂贵的芝士汉堡也无法挽救当地餐馆的危局。飞涨的成本让独立餐馆陷入困境。

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:

item.title: 全副武装的匪帮释放了近 5000 名囚犯，迫使海地两个机场关闭，总理阿里埃勒-亨利下落不明
item.description:
